mng: to fold, to fold over in layers, to furl, to layer, to pile up, to repeat, to duplicate

exm.mng: to overlap, to superimpose, to telescope, to run together, to duplicate, one over another, superposition, an overlap, redundancy, reduplication (in Chinese grammar, e.g. 散散步[san4 san4 bu4] to have a stroll)
to fold, collapsible, folding (bicycle, antenna, bed etc)
repeated layers, stratified, laminated, stacked, piled strata, stromatolite
Diecai district of Guilin city 桂林市[Gui4 lin2 shi4], Guangxi
